mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DDOTMESSAGE (SEQ, NICKNAME, SENDTO, CONTENT, WDATE, READ, DEL) VALUES(SEQ_DDOTMESSAGE.nextval, #{nickname}, #{sendto}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 2)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(*),0) AS cnt FROM DDOTMESSAGE WHERE SENDTO = #{sendto,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL = 2 NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} SENDTO = #{sendto,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL = 0
